comment: My sample comprised spirit aged for four to five years, half drawn from first-fill ex-bourbon casks with a quarter each from virgin American oak and ex-Oloroso sherry. Flavorwise, It delivers melting vanilla ice cream and white pepper on the nose, a fruity palate and a lightly spicy finish. A step up from Teeling Small Batch.
Good pot still Irish whiskey but could have aged a little longer to bring out more flavors
